title: The Week of Jin Miller: A Superhero’s Tale
summary: Jin Miller, a 59-year-old tutor, discovers their unsuspected powers of knowledge absorption and sharing, leading the quiet neighborhood through a series of transformative events over the span of a week, culminating in a grand lesson of unity and strength.
summaryGerman: Jin Miller, ein 59-jähriger Tutor, entdeckt seine unerwarteten Fähigkeiten zur Wissensaufnahme und -teilung, die die ruhige Nachbarschaft im Laufe einer Woche durch eine Reihe transformativer Ereignisse führt und in einer großen Lektion von Einheit und Stärke gipfelt.
summaryDutch: Jin Miller, een 59-jarige tutor, ontdekt zijn onvermoede krachten van kennisopname en -deling, en leidt de rustige buurt door een reeks transformerende gebeurtenissen gedurende de week, en eindigt met een grote les in eenheid en kracht.
summaryFrench: Jin Miller, un éducateur de 59 ans, découvre ses pouvoirs insoupçonnés d'absorption et de partage de connaissances, menant son quartier tranquille à travers une série d'événements transformateurs sur une semaine, qui se concluent par une grande leçon d'unité et de force.
moral: The true power lies within our ability to share and grow together.

story.text: Jin Miller starts his week feeling energetic, tutoring local kids after school, unaware of the sparkling blue aura slowly forming around him whenever he teaches.
The mysterious aura grows stronger. Jin helps a struggling student understand complex math, and as his hands move, the equations seem to float around him, visible only to him.
Jin employs his newfound powers consciously for the first time, tutoring impoverished adults and spreading wisdom which enhances their career prospects dramatically.
The news of Jin's abilities spreads, and his house becomes a beacon, radiating a peaceful glow visible throughout the neighborhood.
Government agents arrive timidly to investigate. They leave inspired, touched by Jin's humble resolve to uplift others, marking an odd day of romance between power and humility.
Jin holds a massive outdoor class, teaching hundreds. The collective learning curves light up the sky, a truly epic spectacle.
Reflecting on his week, Jin feels deeply happy and contemplates how passing on knowledge might be his greatest power and legacy.

ending: With a smile under the twilight sky, Jin Miller realized he had always been a hero, in the classroom and beyond.
